definition: Germany/German/abbr. for 德國|德国[De2 guo2]

pinyin: Ku4 er3 de2 Gong1 ren2 dang3

sentences.english: Protected by lamellar armour, giving these horse archers better protection against enemy attacks.
sentences.chinese: 庫爾德弓騎兵身穿鱗甲，能有效抵禦敵軍攻擊。

sentences.english: They speak the Kurdish language, which is a member of the Iranian branch of Indo-European languages.
sentences.chinese: 他們的語言是庫爾德語，屬於印歐語系伊朗語族。

sentences.english: Iraq's self-ruled Kurdish region has started exporting crude oil for the first time.
sentences.chinese: 伊拉克庫爾德自治區開始首次出口原油。

sentences.english: There was no voting in the semiautonomous Kurdish region in the north, or in the divided city of Kirkuk.
sentences.chinese: 半自治的北方庫爾德地區沒有進行選舉。

sentences.english: Mister Sipan is working to save the traditions of Kurdistan's nomadic shepherds.
sentences.chinese: 西龐先生致力於挽救庫爾德遊牧民族的文化傳統。

sentences.english: The PKK has stepped up attacks after ending its unilateral cease-fire last month.
sentences.chinese: 庫爾德工人黨已加強其單方面停火結束上個月的攻擊。

sentences.english: We taught in the same school in a town in Iranian Kurdistan.
sentences.chinese: 我們在伊朗庫爾德斯坦一個鎮上的同一所學校任教。

sentences.english: This money was stolen by a guerrilla group of Kurd separatists.
sentences.chinese: 這筆錢被庫爾德人組建的游擊隊分子偷走了。

sentences.english: Antagonizing the Iraqi Kurds could upset a delicate security arrangement.
sentences.chinese: 與伊拉克庫爾德人作對可能破壞一個微妙的安全安排。

sentences.english: Mr. Talabani, who is an Iraqi Kurd , says the U.
sentences.chinese: 塔拉巴尼是伊拉克庫爾德人。

sentences.english: One of them was a fluent Arabic and Kurdish speaker; [she] was terrific.
sentences.chinese: 其中一個可以講流利的阿拉伯語和庫爾德語，非常好。

sentences.english: He gesticulated wildly to someone unseen, his eyes full of wine and mirth.
sentences.chinese: 庫爾德粗野地跟別人招手，眼神中充滿了美酒與歡樂。

sentences.english: The Kurds were seen as uncivilized and ignorant, and any expression of a separate identity was seen as a crime.
sentences.chinese: 庫爾德民族被認爲是無知和未開化的民族。

sentences.english: Unlike Berbers and Kurds, they have no flags or leaders.
sentences.chinese: 不像柏柏爾人和庫爾德人，他們沒有氣質或領導。

pinyin: Wu1 zi1 bie2 ke4 si1 tan3

definition: Muslim countries/caliphate/Islamic State group (aka IS or ISIL or ISIS)

pinyin: Ji2 er3 ji2 si1 si1 tan3

definition: Marshal Josip Broz Tito (1892-1980), Yugoslav military and communist political leader, president of Yugoslavia 1945-1980
